description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. An addictive and frantic 1 to 4 player space shooter featuring a grab and shoot game-play mechanic. Grab and build up satellite objects (asteroids, planets and stars) with your Energy Arm to fire into enemies.
description.short: An addictive and frantic 1 to 4 player space shooter featuring a grab and shoot game-play mechanic. Grab and build up satellite objects (asteroids, planets and stars) with your Energy Arm to fire into enemies.
